channel.title: attack.t1003.004 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1003.004 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: DPAPI Domain Backup Key Extraction
item.description: Detects tools extracting LSA secret DPAPI domain backup key from Domain Controllers

item.title: DPAPI Domain Master Key Backup Attempt
item.description: Detects anyone attempting a backup for the DPAPI Master Key. This events gets generated at the source and not the Domain Controller.

item.title: Mimikatz Use
item.description: This method detects mimikatz keywords in different Eventlogs (some of them only appear in older Mimikatz version that are however still used by different threat groups)

item.title: Cred Dump-Tools Named Pipes
item.description: Detects well-known credential dumping tools execution via specific named pipes

item.title: Credential Dumping Tools Service Execution
item.description: Detects well-known credential dumping tools execution via service execution events

item.title: Grabbing Sensitive Hives via Reg Utility
item.description: Dump sam, system or security hives using REG.exe utility

item.title: Possible Impacket SecretDump Remote Activity
item.description: Detect AD credential dumping using impacket secretdump HKTL

item.title: Possible Impacket SecretDump Remote Activity - Zeek
item.description: Detect AD credential dumping using impacket secretdump HKTL. Based on the SIGMA rules/windows/builtin/win_impacket_secretdump.yml
